title: Quarkus 3.0.0.Alpha6 released
content: A week after Alpha5, we are releasing Quarkus 3.0.0.Alpha6. While Alpha5 came with major changes such as the upgrade to Hibernate ORM 6, Alpha6 is a smaller release packed with bugfixes, enhancements, and improvements to our upgrade process. Whatâ€™s new Among all the bugfixes and enhancements, two are worth mentioning...
